thread.title: Ervin carries the load in OT, San Jose State tops UNLV 33-27
thread.title_full: Ervin carries the load in OT, San Jose State tops UNLV 33-27

title: Ervin carries the load in OT, San Jose State tops UNLV 33-27
text:
Ervin carries the load in OT, San Jose State tops UNLV 33-27 - FOX5 Vegas - KVVU Member Center: Ervin carries the load in OT, San Jose State tops UNLV 33-27 Posted: Updated: 
LAS VEGAS (AP) - Tyler Ervin ran on all four of San Jose State's plays in overtime and scored the walk-off touchdown for a 33-27 victory over UNLV on Saturday night. 
Ervin also gave the Spartans (3-3, 2-1 Mountain West Conference) the lead at 27-24, taking Kenny Porter's misdirection screen pass 21 yards with 1:08 left in regulation. Ervin finished with 147 yards from scrimmage, 74 through the air and 73 on the ground. 
UNLV (2-4, 1-1) had the first overtime turn and settled for a 43-yard field goal attempt after going nowhere on three plays. But the Spartans' Isaiah Irving blocked Nicolai Bornand's kick. 
Bornand's 49-yarder with 11 seconds left in regulation forced overtime when it glanced off the right post and through. 
The Rebels erased a 20-10 deficit in the fourth quarter as Kurt Palandech threw TD passes to Andrew Price and Devonte Boyd for a 24-20 lead with 3:49 remaining. Copyright 2015 The Associated Press.   This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
